AIX MKSYSB process documentation

MKSYSB Scripts

/usr/local/scripts/mksysb.shPerform mksysb to a file, store the copy on the Primary MKSYSB target
/usr/local/scripts/mksysb-dr.shCopy the mksysb file to a DR location
/usr/local/scripts/mksysb-tape.shPerform mksysb to a locally attached tape

MKSYSB Setup

  • Install the standard exclude.rootvg
    scp pgnmsv01:/prod/images/etc/exclude.rootvg /etc/exclude.rootvg

Lincolnshire

  1. Copy the mksysb ssh key
    scp -p pgnmsv01:/prod/images/etc/id_dsa.mksysb /usr/local/scripts/id_dsa.mksysb
  2. Copy the latest mksysb script from pgnmsv01
    scp pgnmsv01:/prod/images/scripts/mksysb.sh /usr/local/scripts/mksysb.sh
  3. Test the mksysb once.
    nohup /usr/local/scripts/mksysb.sh &

Interexion

  1. Copy the mksysb ssh key
    scp -p pgnmsv01:/prod/images/etc/id_dsa.mksysb /usr/local/scripts/id_dsa.mksysb
  2. Copy the latest mksysb script from pgnmsv01
    scp pgnmsv01:/prod/images/scripts/mksysb.sh /usr/local/scripts/mksysb.sh
